job.title: Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr
job.description:
Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr

Duration: 7+ months

Location: Plano, TX (After September has to be onsite)

About The Project

It will be a development focused role.

To make sure that we are sharing the right data that we are supposed to.

To help us understanding more about the use of that data.

Currently it is little bit less on machine learning and more on big data side

Day To Day

Primary responsibility are in terms of Control development.

Enhancing the features

Helping with the productionizing of what we are doing

Enhancing our Python and spark detective controls

AWS: S3, EMR and EC2 use for control purpose.

Jenkins experience is helpful in terms of productionising

After that BAU aspect will come where the person will work more on analysing part to find out what is missing and what correction is needed.

Extraction of data using Restful API and Python (Panda)

Perform root analysis

Individual contribution: Good Comm skills are important.

Critical Technical Expertise

BAU: Extracting data using Python (Panda)

Exposure to Restful API to run some analysis

Good Analytical expertise

3-4 years of experience in AWS environment.

Spark

SQL

Nice to Have: Jenkins, AWS Certification is plus (Solution Architect)
